title: Indian Army has set up a 1000-bed quarantine facility in Barmer, Rajasthan? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Several posts have been doing the rounds on social media stating that the Indian Army has set up a 1000-bed quarantine facility in Barmer, Rajasthan with a 100-ventilator set up. The post further compares India’s facility to China’s.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found the claim to be false.

We went to the official Twitter handle of the Indian Army as they have been constantly posting updates about the Coronavirus and their efforts.

While scrolling through their Twitter, we found a tweet by the Indian Army, declaring the above news as fake.

This proves that the viral post is false.
